alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells; Kleberg Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 11:17AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NUECES...SOUTH CENTRAL JIM WELLS AND KLEBERG COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM CDT... At 1116 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of Bishop, or 13 miles southeast of Driscoll, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Kingsville, Driscoll, Bishop, South Texas Botanical Gardens, Ricardo, Riviera, La Gloria, Kingsville Naval Air Station, Kings Crossing Subdivision, Petronila, Loyola Beach, and Chapman Ranch. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 706 and 708. US Highway 77 between mile markers 672 and 708. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
